property.name: Faction
property.value: Nine Tiger

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat 6: After an action target one of your soldier agents: Raise the TN of the action by 4.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Krypt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 6: Target a mission in the discard pile and one in the mission queue. Switch the two mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Aircraft - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cover +2 Mission Craft 6: Discard a mission card adjacent to this mission. Mission Combat X: Retire a vehicle gear in the opposing mission them. The TN is the vehicle's expense.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Auto - Armor - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cover +5 This agent is aways considered exposed. This agent may not perform charisma actions and mission craft actions. React Combat: Before this agent suffers a wound: prevent the wound.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: Before one your agents activates a gear card: Use this agent's expense instead of the activating agent's to activate the gear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat: Reduce by 4 the TN of the next combat action this agent performs this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: Once per game, after Bombay is at a mission you win: Bombay permanently gains +4 expense, +1 to all skills, and your organization affiliation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 5: After an enemy agent moves to his headquarters: Wound and expose the enemy agent. Move this agent to your headquarters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Charisma X: Wound an opposing agent. The TN is the target's cover. If this is a Public mission, expose this agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Name a skill. This agent gains a bonus to the named skill until the end of the turn such that is becomes equal to this current craft.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Auto - Armor

property.name: Rules
property.value: +3 cover Mission actions by agents in this agent's team have +1 TN. Mission Combat X: Wound an opposing agent. Expose this agent if this is a Public mission. The TN is the target's combat or cover, wichever is lower.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2 cover React Combat: Before this agent takes a wound, discard Kevlar BDU: Prevent the wound.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 6: Your opponent's next action this turn has +4 TN. You may perform an Intel action immediately after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft X: After this agent is targeted by an action: Cancel the acton. The TN is the acting agent's expense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: Before this agent activates a gear card, expose him: Reduce the gear's expense by 5.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma 4: Play before this agent activates a gear: That agent has +5 expense (+8 if he is a Fixer) for activating the gear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 7: Target an agent with a budget rating higher than his leader's. Retire the agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma X: Target an agent. Until the end of the turn, Abby Kinkaid gains: "React Combat: After Abby Kinkaid wounds the target during a mission: Gain 1 victory point." The TN is the target's craft.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Auto - Armor

property.name: Rules
property.value: +3 Cover. Other agents in this agent's mission team have +2 cover.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Snoop - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Remove a card in any player's discard pile from the game

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soldier Only. Mission Combat 8: Each agent in the opposing team, in the order of your choosing, must meet a combat TN of 5 or suffer a wound. The first time an enemy agent makes the TN, cancel this action. If this is a public mission, expose this agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport 8: Remove up to two wounds on agents you control. If this action is performed by a Medic, the TN is 0.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Faceman - Informant - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: After the turn begins: Give Miranda a faction alignment of your choice until the end of the turn. Miranda still counts as a Freelancer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Charisma 6: The next mission performed by one of your agents cannot be canceled or redirected.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 6: Target three cards in your discard pile and an opponent. That opponent chooses one of those cards to be placed in your hand and may then remove any of the remaining cards from the game.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gadget - Melee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Charisma X: If this is an Intrigue mission, wound an opposing agent. If the target is wounded, when the mission ends, retire him. The TN is the target's charisma plus cover.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat: Before this agent becomes Exposed as an effect of his action: Prevent the agent from becoming Exposed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 7: Target a mission. Until the end of the turn, agents at that mission have a maximum of 5 in all skills.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Leader Only. React Charisma 4: Before a target agent would be retired during a mission: The agent is not retired until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Target two players. The target players reveal their hands. Leave all revealed action cards face-up until the end of the turn. The target players may play all of the face-up cards as if they were in their own hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Melee actions performed by Klein have -4 TN.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat X: Give target agent -2 to all skills until the end of the turn. This is a Melee action. The TN is the target's craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 5: After this agent is targeted by a Transport action: Redirect the action

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 8: Before another player becomes the active player: This agent may immediately perform a Mission action if this agent performed the last successful Mission action during this mission and this is a chase mission or a solo op

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat: Before an action cancels or redirects a Combat action performed by this agent: Cancel the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport X: If this is a chase mission, wound an opposing agent twice. If this is a Public mission, expose this agent. The TN is the target's transport.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Attach a Firearm or Melee gear to this agent from your hand and activate it. This agent may immediately perform an additional Mission action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat X: After an opposing agent moves into a mission team: Retire the agent. The TN is the target's craft plus transport.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat 5: After this agent takes a wound: Give this agent +4 to all skills until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft: Target a non-leader card you own that has been removed from the game. Return the card to play and shuffle it into your Agency Deck. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While this card is attached, the attacker and defender mission text gains: "After one of your agents becomes Exposed, move the agent to headquarters." Mission Craft 3: Attach this card to the current mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft: Raise or lower the objective number of a solo op by 2. Cynthia may perform this action while at headquarters; if she does, retire her.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Soldier - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Combat 7: Deactivate Daniel. Mission Combat 9: Wound an opposing agent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Soldier - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat: After Kilroy declares an action: Change it to a combat action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 7: Target a lower expense agent you control. Until the end of the turn or Payload is retired, actions on Firearms attached to the target which inflict a wound inflict an additional wound.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: Before a player wins by Victory Points: No player wins until the end of the turn. Then, the player with the most Victory Points wins. If any such players are tied, the one who first reached 20 Victory Points wins.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public - Transport +2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your agents have -1 to all skills for each animal in the room. Defender: Your agents have +1 to all skills for each animal in the room.

card.name: Not THIS Federal Building, You Don't

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public - Combat +6

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: You may not extend to this mission. Defender: If you lose this mission, until the end of the game your agents have -4 expense for activating gear.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public - Transport +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you control the agent with the highest transport at the mission, the mission's objective is lowered by 2. Defender: If you control the agent with the highest transport at the mission, the mission's objective is raised by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Private - Transport +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you win this mission, your leader gains +2 charisma permanently. Defender: If you win this mission, your leader gains +2 charisma permanently.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Transport +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: You may not perform combat and transport actions. Defender: You may not perform combat and transport actions.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Public - Craft +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Actions with a TN greater than 7 are canceled. Defender: Actions with a TN greater than 7 are canceled.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Combat - Public - Charisma +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your agents may perform 'Mission Combat: Wound an opposing Exposed agent.' Defender: Your agents may perform 'Mission Combat: Wound an opposing Exposed agent.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public - Charisma +6

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you successfully perform 4 Mission Transport actions, you immediately win the mission. Defender: All Mission actions performed by opposing agents have +2 TN.

card.name: Race for Life at Beulah Park

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Private - Transport +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you perform 6 or more Mission actions, you lose this mission. Defender: Your actions have +1 TN.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Charisma +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: This mission is worth +3 Victory Points for you if you are wearing a red coat (or shirt). Defender: Your agents have +2 to all skills if your opponent is wearing a red coat (or shirt).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Transport +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you win this mission, for the rest of the game, you draw an additional card during the Debrief Phase. Defender: If you win this mission, for the rest of the game, your opponents must discard a card at the end of the Debrief Phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Charisma +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your agents have +1 to all skills if you are playing in a bar or a restaurant. Defender: Your agents have +2 to all skills if you have a drink at the table.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Private - Combat +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Agents in your mission team have -2 cover and -1 combat for each gear card they have equipped. Defender: Agents in your mission team have -2 cover and -1 combat for each gear card they have equipped.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Public - Combat +6

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: This mission is worth +3 Victory Points if the word 'Michigan' is printed within eyesight. Defender: This mission is worth +3 Victory Points if the word 'Michigan' is printed within eyesight.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Craft +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your non-Exposed agents may perform: 'Mission Combat 4: Wound an opposing agent.' Defender: After one of your agents is retired by another player's action, target an agent in the opposing mission team. Send the target to headquarters.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Public - Charisma +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: After mission teams assign to Carnival of Carnage, put 7 Reveller counters on Carnival of Carnage. Carnival of Carnage has +1 cover for each Reveller counter on it. Defender: After each time an agent successfully performs an action, remove a Reveller counter from Carnival of Carnage.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Private - Combat +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: After you assign your mission team, put a Point token on an agent in your team. If that agent is retired during the mission, each opposing player gains 1 Victory Point and you must place a Point token on another agent in your team. Defender: After you assign your mission team, put a Point token on an agent in your team. If that agent is retired during the mission, each opposing player gains 1 Victory Point and you must place a Point token on another agent in your team.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public - Transport +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your agents may perform: 'Mission Transport 5: Wound an opposing agent.' Defender: Your agents may perform: 'Mission Transport 5: Wound an opposing agent.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Craft +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: After the Attacker and Defender pass consecutively, retire the highest expense opposing agent. Defender: After the Attacker and Defender pass consecutively, retire the highest expense opposing agent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Public - Charisma +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Exposed agents have -2 to all skills. Defender: Exposed agents have -2 to all skills.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Private - Transport +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Wounded agents do not contribute their transport to your skill total for the mission. Defender: Wounded agents do not contribute their transport to your skill total for the mission.Wounded agents do not contribute their transport to your skill total for the mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Public - Combat +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your agents may perform: Mission Transport: If your mission team contains less than 5 agents, move this agent into your mission team. Defender: Your agents have +3 cover. Your agents may not be sent to headquarters.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Public - Charisma +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: After you wound target opposing agent, discard the top card of your Agency Deck. If the bravado of the discard is even, wound the target again. Defender: After you wound target opposing agent, discard the top card of your Agency Deck. If the bravado of the discard is even, wound the target again.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Public - Transport +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Gadget gear cards provide double skill bonuses. Defender: Gadget gear cards provide double skill bonuses.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public - Transport +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your agents may not discard for bravado during this mission. Defender: Your agents may not discard for bravado during this mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Craft +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you win this mission, the Defender must play with his hand face up until the end of the next turn. Defender: If you win this mission, the Attacker must play with his hand face up until the end of the next turn.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public - Transport +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you win this mission, permanently attach this mission to an agent. While attached, this card is a gear card with the Vehicle and Aircraft traits and gives this agent +2 transport and +2 combat. Defender: If you win this mission, permanently attach this mission to an agent. While attached, this card is a gear card with the Vehicle and Aircraft traits and gives this agent +2 transport and +2 combat.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Private - Charisma +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you ever have only one agent on your mission team, that agent is retired. Defender: If you ever have only one agent on your mission team, that agent is retired.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Public - Combat +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Place three Bomb tokens on this mission. All agents may perform: 'Mission Craft 7: Remove a Bomb token from this mission.' Defender: After all players pass consecutively at this mission, wound all agents at this mission once for each Bomb token on this mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fight - Public - Craft +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your agents have +1 to all skills if you are wearing a sports jersey or cap (+2 for both). Defender: Your agents have +1 to all skills if you are wearing a sports jersey or cap (+2 for both).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Craft +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: You may only assign inactive agents to this mission. Defender: You may only assign inactive agents to this mission.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Public - Combat +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your female agents have +2 Charisma. Defender: Your male agents have +2 Combat.
